forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

comments.text: you can paste image textures onto shapes. when context-lasering a thing part, click "copy & paste" and follow the instructions near "image".
the color dialog also has tabs for different materials, two in the middle that can be layered.
when you painted a material onto the shape, hold the trigger on your other hand and move the hand up and down to adjust the slider.
the thing part's "..." options "Snap texture angles" and "Texture scales uniformly" can be used to finetune your wanted material.
